column5: A clean, comfortable space for up to 2 guests just 10 minutes from Sea World/Aquatica. Queen size bed with a TV connected to a Roku with streaming access to all of the latest tv shows and movies. Small closet with hangers for your convenience. Private bathroom with full shower/tub. Towels & washcloths provided. You'll have access through the front door and to the kitchen area if needed. We recommended you park along the street in front of the house. We look forward to welcoming you to our home!
column8: Cozy & Clean Contemporary Private Room with Bath
